name: Other offenses; penalty
text: §281-102  Other offenses; penalty.  If any person violates this chapter or any rule or regulation in effect by authority of this chapter, whether in connection therewith a penalty is referred to or not, for which violation no penalty is specifically prescribed, the person shall be imprisoned not more than six months or fined not more than $1,000, or both. [L Sp 1933, c 40, §63; RL 1935, §2631; am L Sp 1941, c 89, §1(g); RL 1945, §7283; RL 1955, §159-101; am L 1957, c 164, §1; HRS §281-102; am L 1971, c 79, §2; gen ch 1985; am L 1990, c 171, §32]
